public class CustomAssert extends Assert
{
public void assertEquality(Object x, Object y)
{
assertReflexive(x);
assertSymmetric(x,y);
assertConsistent(x,y);
assertNullEquality(x);
}

public void assertReflexive(Object x)
{
assertTrue(x.equals(x));
}
public void assertSymmetric(Object x , Object y)
{
assertTrue(x.equals(y) == y.equals(x));
}
public void assertConsistent(Object x , Object y)
{
boolean eq = a.equals(b);
assertEquals(eq, a.equals(b));
}
public void assertNullEquality(Object x)
{
assertFalse(x.equals(null));
}
}
